website_summaries.verdict: While it's pricey, the Turtle Beach Elite Pro Tournament Headset offers some of the best sound and comfort we've seen in a wired gaming headset.
pros: Comfortable build with leather and memory foam
cons: Only one cable included, with no Y-splitter

customer_reviews.title: So much sound feels like I’m cheating
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed I got just the TAC on it own as I have hyper X headset and works fine can hear so so much more and pin point where shots and footsteps are feels like cheating. had a phew set up issues ie. like game distortion and chat distortion changed some audio settings works like a dream. The presets are good 16 is more then enough. I’m using this on the xbox1X Delivered by DpD and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Damien

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced massively, really not worth the value they charge. Build quality is good however the features of the product aren’t really that wow feeling you’d expect from the product that they charge so much for. The ear cooling technology was good but that’s really the only good thing about it, the surround sound wasn’t as good as I believe it should have been. Was really underwhelming and imo opinion really not worth the price, go and buy the Turtle beach stealth 600 or 700 it’s around half the price and just as good, it’s even wireless. Returned the product and got a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Avoid these!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very careful with headphones as they were expensive purchase for me, but within a month the ear cups started coming off and I had to duct tape them back on. Fast forward 8 months and the headband snapped and although my trusty duct tape holds it together they are extremely uncomfortable to wear now. Disgusting low quality build for such a hefty price tag and I will never purchase from TurtleBeach again.
customer_reviews.author: Brody's ring finger

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS CRAP
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is okay, comfort is very good but the audio is absolutely sh*t I don't pay 200 for a comfy head set the tac for it is terrible to when it's all linked up all you can hear is a static and fuzzy sound then the audio will cut out and pop all the time and it just sounds so bad in game all the back ground sounds are over powering and loud and you cannot hear the stuff you need to I've tried every preset and different modes but still sounds like utter crap I've gone back to my hyper x headset very disappointed with this
customer_reviews.author: cal oconnor

customer_reviews.title: Appalling aftercare!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this headset as a way of improving my gaming immersion. The features of the product sound fantastic. Mine however don't work as intended. They are and have been broken for some time. I have contacted customer service several times and due to the length of time taken for Turtle Beach to respond, now has been going on since the beginning of January with no resolution. They have finally agreed to replace the broken part but haven't sent it out or responded to my query about time scales. This is a premium product without premium aftercare.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hutson

customer_reviews.title: Windows 10 build 1903 cripples it
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought the Elite Pro Tactical Audio Controller as I knew it accepted true multi channel input (7.1ch PCM) for direct DTS processing instead of down mixing on the PC and outputting a bland stereo signal with some virtual surround trickery. Sadly though, since Windows 10 build 1903 it has been limited to stereo PCM, making the surround modes ineffective. Essentially it is now as much use as a chocolate fireguard. Turtle Beach are aware of the problem and have done nothing to resolve it. They haven't even attempted to write their own driver to replace the generic MS one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Sound Profiles
customer_reviews.text: The headset itself is great, but I'm not to much of a fan when it comes to the TAC sound profiles. Ease of use is good, switching between profiles on the fly, changing side tone in a second, balancing voice and game sounds with ease. I've currently bundled the headset with my Astro a40 TR Mixamp and this I find to be the best combo so far! If the TAC had the option to be able to tweak the EQ settings manually via the software then I'm sure I'd use the TAC with the headset instead of the Mixamp from astro. Overall solid product, but could use a little more customization on the EQ.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my gamer partner for his birthday/ Christmas. Very satisfied. Says sound quality is great and they are very comfortable around the ears (he plays for hours) and don't fall off the head nor move around. microphone is a great quality and his friends have no trouble hearing him. overall, sound quality is fantastic and sound cancelling definitely does its job well. Says this is the best gaming headset he had so far.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Zwolinska

customer_reviews.title: Tactical audio adapter
customer_reviews.text: As expected and described. For anyone buying this for the elite pro headset, it’s worth buying if you are currently plugging into XO mixer (which does work for elite pro headset) or plug jack into controller, this neutralises the bass. It has three presets which has one for bass and treble, I found this one the most helpful. Super human hearing is great also but then you can still you that on the XO mixer. Well worth the extra bit of money, I had trouble finding any information on this product and if it it does actually work so hopefully this will shed some light for someone! Great seller!
customer_reviews.author: Lbur2020

customer_reviews.title: The mic kept falling down
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this Mic thinking it would be great. But upon recieving and trying it, when I plugged the mic in it just kept falling down and wouldn't stay in place. I originally give it the benefit out of the doubt and tried a second one. And yet it did the same thing. I then decided to check it out on the internet and it seemed there were alot of people with the exact same issue. I eventually left it completely and moved on. The actual quality was great, but it just would not stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL GARBAGE - AVOID
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have so many flaws, just assume *everything* is flawed. Badly. They borderline don't work on PC (the selection switch is to PC). Audio quality is absolute garbage, with no way to adjust it. Sound worse thatn £10 phones. The mic has never worked reliably, nobody can hear me, and yea, the gain is all set correct. When I switch back to my £50 razer kraken pro v2, everything works fine.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sound and nice and comfortable - after much ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sound and nice and comfortable - after much fiddling about with all the settings, I have ended up using these without the TAC. I have xbox one and the TAC just seemed to add more complexity without any perceived benefit. I still recommend the headphones as they are very comfortable and offer good sound - I am hoping that the TAC will be of more benefit when I connect to PC to play
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This product features great sound and material quality, making gaming, music or movies more enjoyable. Although the cables can sometimes be annoying, for the quality and features its more than worth it. It is also possible to connect it to a phone which makes listening to music easier on the go. In terms of comfort, this headset has outdone itself because of the thick layer in the cushions which provide high comfort even after hours of wearing. This headset might not be the cheapest but if you are willing to spend this amount of money, this headset is probably the best there is.
customer_reviews.author: AnonymousReview

customer_reviews.title: Good but fiddly
customer_reviews.text: Good headset apart from there are a lot of cables to connect correctly and compared with my previous Turtle Beach Elite 800X headset the volume is lower.Comfortable once you adjust it to yourself.Price..... well if you like TurtleBeach you are prepared to pay a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Amazing item, bad build quality + ridiculous price tag!
customer_reviews.text: Great product love it, bad build quality! I've owned the standard t.b xo ones for 3 years still work perfectly today, however in under two months of buying this item and careful ownership it had broken! Also it has two wires for xbox, Can't move at all with the mini amp, again a separate item your tricked into to buying because the headset alone isn't 7.1 surround sound but advertised as. So the price is stupidly high for this item and you feel ripped off after paying £300+ for the headset + mixamp.
customer_reviews.author: iTzBliTzyv3

customer_reviews.title: Good headset
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy! I have had a couple of issues with the controller but I think my dad is to blame as I have reason to believe he dropped it. I used the headset for Xbox One and it didn’t seem to like my controller audio adapter. Without the adapter it has been fine. The T.A.C. is good too, lots of settings.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good piece of kit though a little pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Good piece of kit. You can change the levels of the game sounds coming through your headset independently from the mic’s of your team which is nice. There is a ‘Superhuman hearing’ button which acts as an audio compressor which in some cases I can imagine it being good, though for me it distorts some audio. In hindsight it was a little pricey as for the same price I could have bought a new controller with an audio port.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Simpson

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is poor compared with the astro A40's and Mixamp which I ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is poor compared with the astro A40's and Mixamp which I had and these were a replacement for them. I bought these because I wear glasses and these were supposed to offer relief. I found there was no more relief than the Astros. Don't get me wrong for a gaming headset these are not bad. But not worth the £240 I paid. More like a £140 pair.
customer_reviews.author: Finch

customer_reviews.title: lasted 8 months
customer_reviews.text: lasted 8 months before headset coming away from earpiece. Cannot find anyway of returning through Amazon. I have contacted the manufacturer direct to see if it is covered for a replacement as for the price it should last at least 12 months! fingers crossed I receive a reply.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set of earphones but you really do need it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great set of earphones but you really do need it all to have the full experience with them !! The amp for PS4 works but still you need the rest to level out the sound other than that great
customer_reviews.author: Mickeybone

customer_reviews.title: WORST BUY AVOID
customer_reviews.text: After 1 months glue from ear cushions just diapeared and they broke and after 3 months left ear speaker stopped working for no reason......... AVOID
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Miroslaw Bejma

customer_reviews.title: Audio very buggy!!
customer_reviews.text: Great look and very comfortable but the sound does not work properly for some reason. It doesn't register all sounds being played through, especially background music. I've tried both usb 2.0 and 3.0 but both are buggy. Any ideas why this might be as I'm having second thoughts about this headset.
customer_reviews.author: Connor H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headset and the TAC makes a huge difference
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headset and the TAC makes a huge difference. Would be 5 stars if there was a wireless version of the TAC. And when i say wireless, i mean from the TAC box to the headset.
customer_reviews.author: P. Luc

customer_reviews.title: A definite buy
customer_reviews.text: Better audio quality than the basic, and better noise cancelling
customer_reviews.author: Josh Mather

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: This item should be included with the headset. It costs £50 and has broken within 6 months. It is a money crab don't fall for it. There is probably products that do the same thing for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: gordon strachan

customer_reviews.title: Bad design and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product is bad for the price tag.I bought this for my son who is in his 20's and the band that goes across you head snapped. It was replaced free of charge but now the same has happened to the 2nd one. Seriously not worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: While it has plenty of features, it doesn’t really pull any of them off well. It’s handy though that I can use them for my PS4, XB1 and my PC, but I feel the sound quality on my Stealh 520’s were better, especially with low end frequencies. Save yourself the money and get the stealth range, and they’re all under £100
customer_reviews.author: Matt Davis

customer_reviews.title: brought this mic 5 months ago and has already broken ...
customer_reviews.text: brought this mic 5 months ago and has already broken just by everyday use, headphones always hung on monitor whilst not playing £250 for the headset a mic is not worth it. Wish i went over to the asto's
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Stalley

customer_reviews.title: Terrible audio bug
customer_reviews.text: Sound is decent, once a controller is plugged into the tac box the audio doubles, no matter what I tried it wouldn't help, if I turned down audio on Xbox it muted friends if I turned the tac box down it muted friends, turtle beach said it's a faulty tax box.
customer_reviews.author: mark f.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Great headset for 9 months. Then the lead which connects to the headset stopped working. Then the jack on the headset for the mic never stops making a static sound. The only good thing was the tac audio system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: simply the best
customer_reviews.text: amazing headphones work great on everything i know superb microphone quality and amazing spacial sound which really comes in handy when playing games like pubg or csgo or fortnite
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I doubt there is a better product on the market for gaming, simple as that.
customer_reviews.author: WayneO

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Rubbish. This is the second one I have had after the first one broke. And yes the second one has broken too not lasted a year.
customer_reviews.author: N R FORSYTH

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love turtle beach although mine broke amazin kindly refunded me and I got another lmao
customer_reviews.author: ZeeMagic

customer_reviews.title: Good features but poor ear cup quality
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones but the ear cups are definitely not made very well. I don't game very much and within 2 years both my ear cups on the elite pros have fallen to bits. With all the foam exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 3 months use
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after other brands proved unreliable and easily broken. Despite the price these have also stopped working after 3 months and so far my interaction with customer services has been painful! Inefficient and unconcerned!
customer_reviews.author: Peppa

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My son needed this part for his ear phones to use with the Xbox one. Was compatible and works well and one happy son.
customer_reviews.author: sarah hardy

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: Havent have these turtle beach headsets long as one day just starting making an awful high pitched sound in my ear nearly deafening me, now they dont work, the Tac adapter doesnt full work either! NOT HAPPY.
customer_reviews.author: CamRJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfort, Great sound. Price... Not so much...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome comfortability with great sound. The price is a little steep though. You do really get what you pay for :)
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Not all parts delivered
customer_reviews.text: The headset and Tac are great the only problem is 2 cables going missing Xbox One chat cable and programming cable
customer_reviews.author: ROB

customer_reviews.title: Not professional
customer_reviews.text: Very poor headset overall, the sound seemed to be doubling up during the times I’d use it. In the end I had to return it as it’s not professional.
customer_reviews.author: Reiss

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headset
customer_reviews.text: Truly fantastic. No more charging. Mic mute works. Sound is blocked by headphones meaning complete immersion. I highly recommend them. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Superb headset great value, build and sound quality is fantastic
customer_reviews.author: mr s lanes

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and excellent sound quality, I found using for long periods of time they remained comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Mike Webber

customer_reviews.title: Duno
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t been able to try it out yet as there not suitable for PS4 slims so not to happy and personally think they should come with usb optical cable for this reason as didn’t know
customer_reviews.author: Kieron

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality definitely a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husbands birthday present he loves them uses them for his twitch streaming. Amazing quality well worth there money really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: louisaDavies

customer_reviews.title: The best headset ive ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Quality headset; I have used the elite pro with the TAC for around 4 months. It is extremely comfortable and sound quality is superb. Fully recommended
customer_reviews.author: Wicksy

customer_reviews.title: The 1. 5m break away cable for xbox,
customer_reviews.text: The 1.5m break away cable for xbox, is unreliable and does not work well
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Joanne Selby

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Headset
customer_reviews.text: Good quality headset, very loud and clear sound and perfect comfort to wear for long periods of time. Would definitely recommend this headset if your looking for a high quality one.
customer_reviews.author: Joss Edwards

customer_reviews.title: I really do recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: It is really good headset the sound is great for playing games and when you listen to music it's great I use the on the xbox and it's perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, Style and Sound
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and feel great, look great and not too big and some great sound perfect for Blackout!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Grainger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Quality
customer_reviews.text: Sound perfect , can play about 6 hour and fill very good
customer_reviews.author: Tomasz Golla

customer_reviews.title: Good product but bits missing
customer_reviews.text: I got the gaming head set today and the t a c is not there
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M.

customer_reviews.title: Used a HDMI extractor but feel like it wasn't worth it
customer_reviews.text: Had issues with this as trying to use it with PS4 slim which does not have optical cable. Used a HDMI extractor but feel like it wasn't worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: This product has a 1 month warranty. difficult when buyi g for a birthday present. Couldn't return.
customer_reviews.text: Too complicated. Problem after only 1 week with sound. Trying to access support a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing great quality. Extremely impressed. Worth the money. Thanks TURTLE BEACH.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price and the sound quality ain't even that good
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: brilliant sound and crystal clear mic
customer_reviews.text: brilliant sound and crystal clear mic. As a glasses wearer these are also the most comfortable headphones I have owned. 5 star rating well deserved.
customer_reviews.author: C1iffiko

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, my son loves them, having been wanting these for a long time got them at a good price
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not so Elite Pro
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality mediocre and the mic didn't work. Pay the extra and get Astro A50's
customer_reviews.author: Paddy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound quality, amazing microphone! Doesn't leave marks around your ears or hurt your head even after 5 hour gaming sessions!
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Great sound with amazing Bass
customer_reviews.text: Great sound with amazing Bass. Good Comfort and long microphone. Professionally packed and doesnt smell of cheap plastic rubber but of good quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the turtle beach elite pro round about 2-3 ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the turtle beach elite pro round about 2-3 months ago and the breakaway cable has snapped off at the end where it plugs into the controller
customer_reviews.author: Josh cuppitt

customer_reviews.title: ... my headset not too long ago and I really like this headset
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: it has been less than a year since I bought these headphones and the plastic on the top of the headset has just snapped off while I was wearing it. Had to tape and superglue it back together but now the comfort is not the same. I said positive things before when I first bought them but now, the durability is making me double think about this. Unless I find a pair that's a cheaper used price that's worth buying them again, I'm probably going to look somewhere else for a headset...
customer_reviews.author: Luis Cuadros

customer_reviews.title: Defective Materials Used
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Had this product for 2-3 months and they broke at the junction of the headband and earcup. This was not do to abuse or mishandling. Cheap, defective plastic! This has happened to no less than 8 others that I have seen through reviews. I am so frustrated that I have tried several times to contact Turtle Beach to get a replacement or money back and no one has gotten back to me! I will never buy another Turtle Beach product because of their horrible customer service! Other than the fact that they can no longer be worn, they do work, and so I gave a one star rating. 😡😤
customer_reviews.author: Nancy R.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, Flimsy, Flaky, Poor Features, Not for Large Heads.
customer_reviews.text: First off, my Turtle Beach Elite Pro Tournament Gaming Headset just broke in half, six months after purchase, while on a call. While the rotating hinges seem to be metal, the headband is plastic, and broke at the attachment point. Additionally, shortly after purchase, the volume wheel stopped going to "100%", instead going to "100% left channel" when pushed past 98%. The control layout is worse than competitive Sennheiser headsets, which put the mute switch in the microphone stalk, and the volume on the other earpiece. The sizing is poor, unsuited for larger heads or hats. The earpiece covers seem un-removable for cleaning, and lastly, while the drivers deliver decent sound, the headset itself is unduly heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Young

customer_reviews.title: Defective Mic Big Disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with a Defective Microphone. I've tried them on both the Xbox One and the PS4 Pro. The microphone was totally defective. I'm returning for a refund. I'm a huge fan of Turtle Beach. There the only company I've been buying from for 10 years. I'm going to attempt to get these Elite Pro's again since they're so highly recommended within the gaming community. But this was a big disappointment. If you go to their website they'll tell you that more then likely you have a defective microphone and they attempt to have you purchase a new one for $14.
customer_reviews.author: Caden Joyner

customer_reviews.title: Comfy headset, but low quality microphone.
customer_reviews.text: Headset is very comfortable and the design to recess the ear cup for glasses is an amazing idea but... The omni-directional microphone is a huge let down. The mic picked up way too much background noise for my gaming friends. My less expensive Hyper X Cloud headset was better than this microphone! I ultimately returned these and picked up the Astro A40... Which are amazing. Go with the Astros if you want amazing comfort, sound quality and no background noise.
customer_reviews.author: C. Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Best headset for those with hearing loss :)
customer_reviews.text: Just love this headset. It's got to be the best headset i have gotten so far. I have a hearing loss or considered "deaf" i do wear hearing aids but it just isn't enough for just any headset out there. The Elite Pro really helps me hear my friends. I can even hear the gameplay at the same time. Another pro thing to the headset is the accessories you can get to enhance your gameplay. Like an audio mixer that connects to the headset to adjust the volume. The headset is good for those with hearing loss or wear hearing aids just like me. I would definitely recommend it to the gamers out there.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Hands down most comfortable thing I've ever put on my head
customer_reviews.text: These are incredible. The gel pads make them mold to your ears beautifully and always stay cool. The sound is amazing. Bass. Volume. Treble. Footsteps. Metallic clang of guns firing. ALL.OF.IT. Is just perfect. Outstanding sound on every level. You hold these in your hand and you can FEEL the quality. They have enough weight to not feel cheap. But not so much that you get a headache. I swear whoever designed these sweet little head huggers took all the very best parts of all the greatest headsets, and made them into one single pair. And for that, they deserve a hug themselves. Buy these. You will never regret it. One of my best purchases ever.
customer_reviews.author: KRocque

customer_reviews.title: Switching to another brand after this disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t recommend this headset to anyone, it was a very bad idea to include a mute and volume adapter to the wire that connects to the headset as there are way to many places the wire can go bad. Purchased one sent back because the sound was in and out and very static the second one the right headphone stopped working within 2 days.. I’m not playing at loud sounds or anything the headset literally only worked correctly for maybe 15 minutes total time of while I’ve had both. Completely lost faith in turtle beach I’m giving Astro headsets a chance now.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Atty

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headset
customer_reviews.text: Truly amazing headset. Pros -very comfy -crisp and clear sound -made well does not feel cheap -mic does not pick up everyone's voice in the room -beautiful design Cons -i think the sound mixer is very necessary without it all the noises seem to be at the same volume so footsteps won't be loud enough with other noises
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just read and see what i have to say
customer_reviews.text: First off all this is a great headset. Very durable material, fits snug on the head, the sound quality is clear, and it just feels like a $200 headset. My only problem, was that I couldn't hear footsteps or direction or the footsteps in H1Z1 KotK. I currently use the Turtle Beach Stealth 500P and that is significantly more clear as to sound quality, and direction in which the footsteps are coming from. On PS4 however, the headset performed phenomenally. 5 stars if you're going to use it on there. However being a mainly PC gamer, not being able to hear footsteps very well in a battle royal game is crucial so keep that in mind
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cheap plastic, snapped
customer_reviews.text: As you can see in the photo the plastic is so cheap and poorly made, the headphones simply snapped as I was putting them on. This is the 2nd pair after support gave me a replacement and they broke in the exact same spot again.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great but...
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones but they do lack some comfort and it isn't exactly lightweight either. The slider for volume does mess up with the balance of the sound going out occasionally but sounds amazing when it does work. My advice would be find something lightweight like skullcandy slyr (i have it and still going strong, looks great even when not gaming) but comparing turtle and skull, turtle sounds better but not designed for long sessions or small heads.
customer_reviews.author: Crayon

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Crap construction. Headset is functional after a year of solid use and while well taken care of, they’re falling apart! Not the first set of turtle beaches that have done this to me, but they will be the last!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: These are a disgrace.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. Love my XO Seven’s so thought I’d update since I’ve had them for years but these are pitiful. The directional sound is none existent. I couldn’t pay me to wear this headset. And yes I tried both the audio adapter and controller. Both did absolutely nothing to help.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: TURTLE CRAP!! Mine, like many others, broke without any mistreatment. Don’t buy this brand.
customer_reviews.text: TURTLE BEACH stuff is not good. Simply as that. Like MANY other reviewers, my headphones broke WITHOUT ANY MISTREATMENT. I put them on my bed an they snapped ON BOTH SIDES IN THE SAME WEAK SPOT. Just BAD DESIGN. Will not buy this brand again. I almost made the mistake or recommending this to coworkers as everyone needs headsets now.
customer_reviews.author: Godardth

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Mic is lose tho
customer_reviews.text: Great sounds. Didn't know I had to but the audio adapter for my Xbox controller so that was annoying. The only reaso I am giving it 4 stars is because the mic is lose and doesn't always stay in the same place. Maybe because it is a refurbished headset. Still love them and I don't have to worry about the batteries dying because they plug into the controller.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good and chat works and sound great,but i am so done with this company,bought the elite headset and it snapped in half in just over a year. This has happened to every set of turtle beeches I have owned. I take pride in the stuff I own and take great care of it .
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Heavy with a short cord
customer_reviews.text: They suctioned to my ears and were kind of heavy which is hard for me to wear for long periods. I was hoping to wear them for work because the mic is pretty good but it was too heavy and I returned them. I think they are weighted to feel higher quality. Even for just working next to my laptop the cord is annoyingly short, you will want an extension.
customer_reviews.author: pinkmist

customer_reviews.title: Best gaming headset.
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best purchases i have made for my gaming setup. The big plus here is the glasses relief system. Supper comfy supper clear. Would recommend to anyone who plays for more the 3 hours at a time and multiple days a week. Also would strongly encourage purchasing the tactical audio controller as it has many audio functions that increase the value of this headset.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Peissig

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for Gaming and Meetings
customer_reviews.text: I wanted headphones that I could use for PS4 gaming, but also for work meetings on a PC (Mac). These headphones work great for both. What sold me was the ComforTec system. I have to wear glasses, and have typically avoided full headphones because of this. These are really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound.  Terrible Durability.
customer_reviews.text: For $200 you should be suspect about a 1-year warranty. Earpad coverings started slipping off within a few months of use. Not a big deal, you could order more; I just hot glued mine back. Within 6 months pieces of plastic started breaking off where the earpads connect to the headband. By a year and a couple of months, I had taped both sides where the earpads meet the headband. By a 1 year and a half, the headband completely broke and is unusable. The sound quality is incredible. The durability is awful for the price. I used daily.
customer_reviews.author: A. Walters

customer_reviews.title: i don't find myself using it a great deal because i travel so much and its hard ...
customer_reviews.text: i bought the complete set of turtle beach elite pro tactical audio headset. i don't find myself using it a great deal because i travel so much and its hard to unpack and set up on a constant basis. if you can set it up and leave it, its awesome. slightly over priced but awesome. after about a year now i been using it, still works fine.
customer_reviews.author: The Drifter

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Static after 1 year of use.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working under 1 year of use. Extremely heavy static. I’ve kept it in great condition but with mild use. Won’t be buying Turtle Beaches again. 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality at best
customer_reviews.text: My expectations were met, the comfort of the cushions feels great for long duration of gameplay. As for the sound it's great unless you tend to use the tactical sound card then go all in. Microphone from what I'm told sounds crisp no issues with the mic whatsoever. It's pricey of course, however I always put out if the price is good and the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Yasakani

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Audio is terrible with no amp. Mic doesnt work. Customer service didnt get back to me.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A Newman

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after 2 months cheaply made...
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart after 2 months cheaply made... should be able to return or exchange 2 months is NOT when something should fall apart
customer_reviews.author: Carol Grimsley

customer_reviews.title: Don’t over pay
customer_reviews.text: My friends can hear an echo but I’ve tried everything to get rid of it, just switched to a mich cheaper pair and no echo, they feel nice, but no worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Alonzo

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t ask for better headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones worked better than expected. The sound is unfair when playing combat games (COD / fortnite) you can hear everything everywhere. Had mine almost 2 years and nothing has come apart or look worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great comfort, cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, great comfort, cheap plastic. My friend and I both bought this headset and loved it. Although, after about a year and a half the plastic headband snapped for both of us. It's very upsetting as I hoped this would last for a while. Would recommend if it didn't break!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice headset except when they break
customer_reviews.text: Nice pair of headphones, but they break easily. The rig for the top of the head support broke completely at the head strap. So the headphones end up resting directly on top of my head. Audio quality and nose cancellation was great. Like wearing a pair of earmuffs. Very comfortable until it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound and comfort- But break easily on top.
customer_reviews.text: Well I had them for less than a year. They were amazing when it came to sound quality and comfort which is what you want, but the plastic on top is very flimsy. After a year it finally snapped and now it won’t stay on my head. A little under a year of putting them on and taking them off wears it down quickly. Kinda disappointed. Great headphones besides nit being that sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Tory Kenner

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Bad sound
customer_reviews.text: We returned these. One they were corded, we knew that, but that length was not ideal. Plus, there was always a high pitch hum in the ear piece. Could not be adjusted to go away and still function well in game. Didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: K2Lcort

customer_reviews.title: For the MLG enthusiast...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality! Using these for FPS games you can hear footsteps from very far away. Even without the TAC, it doesn't get much better in the sound department. Build quality is also incredible; these boys are both built to last and offer supreme comfort to your head. Not for casual use. Buy these ONLY if you heavily engaged in competitive FPS.
customer_reviews.author: Josh M.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality headphones.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are just amazing and produce crisp, clear sound. The noise cancelation is really great too. My one and only complaint is that it can be a bit uncomfortable for gamers that wear glasses like me.
customer_reviews.author: Cayman

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these, they sound and feel phenomenal the only problem is they break within 6 months. We'll see if i can actually get a warranty replacement this time.
customer_reviews.author: adam pomponio

customer_reviews.title: Microphone is terrible
customer_reviews.text: The headphone quality is fine. The mic is garbage. Would cut in and out and after fiddling around with it for a month and a half it stopped working. How something can cost $200 and die after a month and a half. When in comparison another turtle beach headset for half the price lasted three years. That doesn’t make sense. Stay away from this headset as I see many more people having problems with it as well. Not to also mention the very limited options of volume control and muting. That’s it. Where as my last headset from them that was half the price had bass, treble, and a louder option for my mic.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hays

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic breaks
customer_reviews.text: Product is already broken. Manufacturer is apparently using very cheap plastic now since this is the 3rd headset this has happened to. I've bought Tuttle Beach for years but this will be my last set
customer_reviews.author: Rena Plumley

product_meta.title: Turtle Beach Elite Pro Tournament Gaming Headset - PS4, PS4 Pro, Xbox One, Xbox One X and PC
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Gaming HeadsetThe Turtle Beach Elite Pro is the first gaming headset designed from the ground-up for today's generation of eSports athletes and hardcore gamers. The Elite Pro's 50mm Nanoclear speakers deliver more efficient, crisper audio with less distortion for a game changing sound experience, while the Pro Gaming Microphone with TruSpeak Technology provides crystal clear chat so your commands are always heard. The Elite Pro also debuts Turtle Beach's unique ComforTec Fit System - a revolutionary adjustment system for truly personalized comfort, including AeroFit Ear Cushions - where groundbreaking material technologies combine to deliver cooling comfort as well as passive noise isolation and deeper bass response, and the patented ProSpecs Glasses Relief System - alleviating ear cushion pressure for gamers who wear glasses. Elite eSports performance, ultimate comfort…this is Elite Pro!

SAFETY WARNING
For ages 13 and up.

BOX CONTAINS
Elite Pro Headset, Elite Pro Gaming Microphone, Elite Pro 1.3m Audio Cable and Elite Pro Quick Start Guide

See more
feature_bullets: ComforTec fit system: Experience a groundbreaking level of comfort with this, adjustable fit system
ProSpecs glasses relief system: Comfortably wear your headset with glasses thanks to our patented, pressure-relieving technology
Pro gaming Mic with TruSpeak technology: Ensure your voice is heard loud and clear with this professional quality mic
50 mm nanoclear speakers: Immerse yourself in the game and hear your teammates clearly, thanks to our signature eSports audio tuning
Aerofit ear cushions: Material technologies combine to keep your ears comfortable and cool, while also blocking out external noise and improving bass response
